name: crashworthy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a vehicle is crashworthy, it is able to protect the people travelling in it if there is a serious accident: Crash-test data confirms that they are building far safer and more crashworthy cars in far less time than before. They alleged that the vehicle was not crashworthy due to design and manufacturing defects.
More examplesFewer examplesHe testified in court that he thought the bus was crashworthy.Over the years, carmakers have made their vehicles more crashworthy.To be safe, get a mid-size car with a top crashworthy rating.
